title: Skills security hardening from PR review
description:
Address remaining CodeRabbit suggestions from PR #5:
- skills_execute: Add timeout to prevent scripts hanging indefinitely
- skills_execute: Consolidate on spawn (remove ctx?.$ branch)
- skills_read: Harden path traversal for Windows (backslash, absolute paths)
- skills_init: Tighten script_name validation for Windows separators
- skills_create: Quote YAML scalars in generateSkillContent (already addressed via gray-matter)
- Test improvements: Use unique temp dir per test run, make import.meta.url assertion less brittle

title: Add validation to promotePattern state transition
description: src/pattern-maturity.ts:266-282 - promotePattern throws on deprecated but silently returns on already proven. Consider warning or error for unexpected states like promoting from "candidate" without enough feedback.

title: Document minSuccessRate default in formatSuccessfulPatternsForPrompt
description: src/anti-patterns.ts:333 - minSuccessRate default 0.7 (70%) is arbitrary. Add JSDoc: "/** @param minSuccessRate - Minimum success rate to include (default 0.7 = 70%, chosen to filter out patterns with marginal track records) */"

title: Add JSDoc to extractPatternsFromDescription regex patterns
description: src/anti-patterns.ts:220-260 - strategyPatterns array has 12 regex patterns but no explanation of detection logic. Add comment: "Detects common decomposition strategies via keyword matching. Not exhaustive - patterns can be manually created for novel strategies."

title: swarm.ts:920-956 - queryCassHistory returns null with no distinction on failure types
description: swarm.ts:920-956 - queryCassHistory returns null for "unavailable", "failed", and "no results" cases without distinction. Callers can't tell if they should retry or if CASS is disabled. Suggested fix: Return structured result with status enum.

title: storage.ts:248-273 - Silent JSON parse failures in find()
description: src/storage.ts:248-273 - The find() method catches JSON parse errors and returns empty arrays with no logging. If semantic-memory returns malformed data, callers have no visibility. Suggested fix: Log parse errors to console.warn before returning empty array.

title: storage.ts:225 - Missing error handling in store() method
description: src/storage.ts:225 - The store() method in SemanticMemoryStorage silently swallows errors. If execSemanticMemory fails, no error is thrown or logged. Suggested fix: Check result.exitCode and throw if non-zero, or at minimum log the error.

title: Implement rate limiter class
description: Create RateLimiter class using Redis sorted sets for sliding window rate limiting

title: Integrate rate limiting into API endpoints
description: Add rate limiting middleware to send_message and other high-traffic endpoints

title: Add rate limit configuration and tests
description: Add rate limit config to docker-compose.yml and create integration tests

title: Document schema_name enum values in structured_validate
description: src/structured.ts:351-353 - schema_name enum ["evaluation", "task_decomposition", "bead_tree"] not documented. Add description: "Schema to validate against (evaluation=agent self-eval, task_decomposition=swarm breakdown, bead_tree=epic+subtasks)"

title: Fix 12 medium-priority audit bugs
description: Fix error handling and validation gaps identified in audit. Grouped by file for parallel work.

title: Fix learning.ts bugs (3): unbounded memory, division by zero, empty events
Fix swarm.ts bugs (5): silent failures, missing validation, reservation leaks
Fix rate-limiter.ts bugs (2): Redis fallback retry, SQL bounds checks

description: src/tool-availability.ts:108 - bunx timeout 10000ms is magic number. Extract to constant: `const BUNX_TIMEOUT_MS = 10000;` for consistency with other timeouts.

title: Implement Strategic Swarm Planner
description: Add strategy selection, planning prompts, example agent, and learning integration for swarm decomposition

title: Add tests for swarm_select_strategy and swarm_plan_prompt
Refactor swarm to coordinator-centric model
description:
Fix the fundamental issue: Task subagents don't have access to Agent Mail/beads tools. Move coordination to the main agent (coordinator) instead of expecting subagents to coordinate themselves.

Key changes:
1. Simplify SUBTASK_PROMPT - remove Agent Mail/beads instructions (agents can't use them)
2. Add swarm_spawn_subtask - coordinator reserves files, marks bead, returns simple prompt
3. Add swarm_complete_subtask - coordinator releases files, closes bead, creates issue beads
4. Coordinator handles ALL Agent Mail communication on behalf of subagents

title: Create SUBTASK_PROMPT_V2 - simplified prompt without coordination instructions
Implement swarm_spawn_subtask tool - reserves files, marks bead, returns prompt
Implement swarm_complete_subtask tool - releases files, closes bead, handles issues
Update swarm integration tests for coordinator-centric flow
Update index.ts exports for new swarm tools
agent-mail.ts:221-245 - Race condition in checkWindow Redis pipeline
description: agent-mail.ts:221-245 (rate-limiter.ts transplanted) - The Redis checkWindow uses pipeline but doesn't handle the case where pipeline.exec() returns null. Network failure or Redis disconnect returns null, causing undefined access on results[1]?.[1]. Suggested fix: Check for null results before accessing.

title: Swarm should support research task decomposition with pdf-brain
description:
Currently swarm coordinator treats "research" tasks as single-agent work. Should decompose research into parallel agents that:

1. Search different sources (pdf-brain, repo-crawl, cass, web)
2. Focus on different aspects of the question
3. Synthesize findings into coherent answer

Example decomposition for "debug levers for agent mail":
- Agent 1: Search pdf-brain for "agent debugging", "MCP server configuration"
- Agent 2: Crawl the repo README, .env.example, config.py
- Agent 3: Search cass for past sessions dealing with agent-mail errors
- Agent 4: Synthesize findings from other agents

Strategy selection should recognize research keywords:
- research, investigate, explore, find, discover, understand, learn, analyze

Tool availability check:
- If pdf-brain available, include PDF search subtask
- If repo-crawl available, include repo exploration subtask
- If cass available, include history search subtask

Files: src/swarm.ts (add research strategy), src/tool-availability.ts

title: Document why GET instead of HEAD in urlReachable
description: src/tool-availability.ts:64-68 - Comment says "Use GET instead of HEAD - some servers don't support HEAD" but doesn't clarify that we check .ok, not response body. Add: "We only check response.ok status, not body content, so GET has minimal overhead vs HEAD."

description: Add rate limit check to tool_send_message. Return 429 with retry-after header when exceeded. Track by agent_id.

description: Test rate limiting behavior: limit enforcement, Redis failover to SQLite, 429 responses, retry-after headers.

title: beads.ts:163-172 - No validation of bd create output before parsing
description: beads.ts:163-172 - beads_create assumes bd create --json always returns valid JSON. If bd crashes or returns non-JSON error, parseBead throws generic error. Suggested fix: Check if stdout is empty or contains "error" before parsing.

title: Extract magic number 2000 to constant in tool-availability.ts
description: src/tool-availability.ts:58 - Default timeout 2000ms is magic number. Extract to constant: `const DEFAULT_URL_TIMEOUT_MS = 2000;` for clarity and reusability.

title: rate-limiter.ts:607 - Redis connection error swallowed, no retry
description: rate-limiter.ts:607 - createRateLimiter catches Redis errors and falls back to SQLite immediately. No retry logic or connection validation beyond initial ping. Transient failures cause permanent fallback. Suggested fix: Retry connection with backoff before fallback.

title: beads.ts:509-532 - beads_sync timeout implementation is buggy
description: beads.ts:509-532 - withTimeout creates timeout promise but never clears the setTimeout if operation succeeds first. Causes lingering timers that reject after function returns. Suggested fix: Clear timeout in finally block of Promise.race.

storage.ts:276-305 - Silent failures in list() method
description: src/storage.ts:276-305 - Similar to find(), list() silently returns empty array on failures (non-zero exitCode or parse errors). No logging. Suggested fix: Log warnings for exitCode failures and JSON parse errors.

title: rate-limiter.ts:328 - Opportunistic cleanup without bounds
description: rate-limiter.ts:328 - SqliteRateLimiter cleanup happens 1% of the time but could delete large datasets without limit or batching. On large DBs, this blocks recordRequest. Suggested fix: Add LIMIT clause or batch deletion.

title: Add JSDoc examples to CriterionEvaluation

title: Analyze opencode-swarm-plugin for improvements
description: Deep code review to identify bugs, missing tests, documentation gaps, and improvement opportunities across the plugin

Audit learning and storage: learning.ts, storage.ts, pattern-maturity.ts
beads.ts:260-278 - Epic rollback may fail silently
description: beads.ts:260-278 - beads_create_epic catches rollback errors and logs them but continues. If multiple rollbacks fail, final error message may be misleading. Suggested fix: Collect rollback errors and include them in thrown error.

title: Docker integration test infrastructure

title: AI Agent Pattern Research: Plugin Improvement Analysis
description:
Research synthesis from PDF library (Patterns for Building AI Agents, Principles of Building AI Agents, Training Complex Cognitive Skills) applied to opencode-swarm-plugin improvements.

## Key Patterns Identified

### 1. Context Engineering (from Patterns for Building AI Agents)
- **Current gap**: Our SUBTASK_PROMPT is verbose but lacks structured context sections
- **Pattern**: "Context engineering is both art and science" - Karpathy
- **Improvement**: Add explicit context sections: [IDENTITY] [TASK] [CONSTRAINTS] [TOOLS] [OUTPUT]

### 2. Context Compression (p.37-39)
- **Current gap**: No automatic context pruning between agent tasks
- **Pattern**: "Periodic context compression can prune irrelevant context"
- **Improvement**: Add `swarm_compress_context` tool that summarizes completed work

### 3. Feed Errors Into Context (p.40)
- **Current gap**: Errors are logged but not fed back into agent context
- **Pattern**: "Good agents examine and correct errors when something goes wrong"
- **Improvement**: Add error accumulator that feeds into retry prompts

### 4. Parallelize Carefully (p.31)
- **Current gap**: We spawn parallel agents but don't ensure context sharing
- **Pattern**: "Ensure subagents can share context along the way"
- **Improvement**: Add `swarm_broadcast` for mid-task context updates

### 5. List Failure Modes (p.46)
- **Current gap**: No classification of why agent failures occur
- **Pattern**: "Create classification process for agent failures"
- **Improvement**: Add failure taxonomy to swarm_record_outcome

### 6. Tool Calling Best Practices (Principles p.36)
- **Current gap**: Tool descriptions are functional but not semantic
- **Pattern**: "Use semantic naming that matches tool's purpose"
- **Improvement**: Audit all tool descriptions for semantic clarity

### 7. Workflows as Tools (Principles p.109)
- **Current gap**: Swarm is a command, not composable
- **Pattern**: "Multi-agent architecture = primitives + arrangement"
- **Improvement**: Make swarm_decompose callable from other workflows

### 8. Implicit Feedback Scoring (already implemented)
- **Current strength**: swarm_record_outcome tracks duration/errors/retries
- **Enhancement**: Add strategy-specific scoring (file-based vs feature-based)

## Recommended Improvements (Priority Order)

1. **HIGH**: Context compression between subtasks
2. **HIGH**: Error accumulator for retry prompts  
3. **MEDIUM**: Failure mode taxonomy
4. **MEDIUM**: Mid-task context broadcast
5. **LOW**: Semantic tool description audit
6. **LOW**: Composable workflow primitives

title: swarm.ts:1620-1670 - runUbsScan doesn't validate JSON structure
description: swarm.ts:1620-1670 - runUbsScan parses JSON but doesn't validate with schema. If UBS changes output format, could return malformed data or throw cryptic errors. Suggested fix: Define Zod schema for UBS output and validate.

title: Document regex limitations in attemptJsonRepair
description: src/structured.ts:249-272 - attemptJsonRepair has comment "This is a simple heuristic - won't work for all cases" but doesn't list known limitations. Add JSDoc: "Limitations: single quotes in nested objects, escaped quotes in keys, multiline string detection"

title: Extract magic number 0.01 epsilon to constant in pattern-maturity.ts
description: src/pattern-maturity.ts:167 - `epsilon = 0.01` for float comparison is magic number. Extract to module constant: `const FLOAT_EPSILON = 0.01;` and document: "Tolerance for floating-point comparisons"

title: Make Agent Mail auto-restart more aggressive
description:
Agent Mail server frequently gets into bad state with "Server encountered an unexpected error" but auto-restart is too conservative.

Current config:
- failureThreshold: 2 (needs 2 failures before restart)
- restartCooldownMs: 30000 (30 second cooldown)

Problems:
1. First failure doesn't trigger restart, just retries
2. 30s cooldown is too long when server is truly broken
3. After restart, availability cache isn't cleared aggressively enough

Proposed fix:
1. Reduce failureThreshold to 1 (restart on first "unexpected error")
2. Reduce restartCooldownMs to 10000 (10 seconds)
3. Add proactive health check on agentmail_init that triggers restart if server is unhealthy
4. Clear availability cache after any restart attempt
5. Add `agentmail_restart` tool for manual restart

Files: src/agent-mail.ts

title: swarm.ts:1774-1777 - File reservation release without verification
description: swarm.ts:1774-1777 - swarm_complete calls release_file_reservations but doesn't check if it succeeds. If release fails, reservations leak and block other agents. Suggested fix: Check mcpCall result and log/retry on failure.

title: rate-limiter.ts:383-410 - Missing bound checks in checkWindow SQL queries
description: rate-limiter.ts:383-410 - checkWindow SQL queries don't validate query result before accessing .count or .timestamp properties. If query fails or returns unexpected shape, undefined access occurs. Suggested fix: Add null checks and validation.

title: Add JSDoc to TaskDecomposition.reasoning field

title: agent-mail.ts:94 - Potential resource leak in process cleanup
description: agent-mail.ts:94 - The finally block calls proc.kill() unconditionally. If the process already exited normally, kill() may fail or have no effect. Not checking proc.exited status first. Suggested fix: Check if process is still running before calling kill().

title: Document subtask index in SubtaskDependency

title: Add module-level JSDoc to structured.ts

title: Add usage example to resetToolCache JSDoc

title: Simplify double destructuring in structured_parse_evaluation
description: src/structured.ts:444 - `(v as { passed: boolean }).passed` type assertion is verbose. Since we've validated with EvaluationSchema, use type guard or cast validated earlier: `const criterion = v as CriterionEvaluation; criterion.passed`

title: Update README to document skills feature
Add repo-crawl tools to swarm plugin
description:
repo-crawl is essential for research tasks. Should be part of the plugin rather than a separate MCP server.

Tools to add:
- repo_readme(repo) - Get README content
- repo_structure(repo) - Get repo structure and tech stack
- repo_tree(repo, path?) - Get directory tree
- repo_file(repo, path) - Get file content
- repo_search(repo, query) - Search code in repo

Implementation:
- Use GitHub API (unauthenticated for public repos, GITHUB_TOKEN for private)
- Add to tool-availability.ts checks
- Integrate with research-based strategy

Files: src/repo-crawl.ts (new), src/index.ts, src/tool-availability.ts

title: Docker integration test infrastructure

title: Extract magic number 9 to constant in recordPatternObservation
description: src/anti-patterns.ts:189 - `.slice(-9)` to keep last 10 examples (9 + new = 10) is not obvious. Extract to constant: `const MAX_EXAMPLE_BEADS = 10;` and use `slice(-(MAX_EXAMPLE_BEADS - 1))`

title: swarm.ts:820-840 - queryEpicSubtasks returns empty on error with only warning
description: swarm.ts:820-840 - queryEpicSubtasks logs warning on failure but returns empty array. Callers can't distinguish between "no subtasks" and "query failed". Could cause incorrect status reporting. Suggested fix: Throw error or return Result type.

title: Document shared_context usage pattern
description: src/schemas/task.ts:62 - `shared_context` field comment "Context to pass to all agents" is vague. Add example: "/** Shared context for all agents (e.g., API contracts, shared types, project conventions) */"

title: Add validation message for datetime schema
description: src/schemas/bead.ts:51-53 - datetime schemas have default Zod error messages. Add custom message: `.datetime({ offset: true, message: "Must be ISO-8601 with timezone" })`

title: Add minimum observation threshold to formatMaturityForPrompt
description: src/pattern-maturity.ts:337-354 - formatMaturityForPrompt shows percentages even for 1 observation (100% from 1 sample is misleading). Add check: if total < 3, show "Limited data (N observations)" instead of percentages.

title: Document extraction strategy priority order
description: src/structured.ts:118-190 - extractJsonFromText tries 6 strategies but priority reasoning not documented. Add JSDoc: "Strategies tried in order: 1) direct parse (fastest), 2-3) code blocks (common), 4-5) brace matching (resilient), 6) repair (last resort)"

title: Extract magic number 200 to constant in structured.ts
description: src/structured.ts:329 - Magic number 200 for preview length. Extract to constant: `const RAW_INPUT_PREVIEW_LENGTH = 200;` and use it on lines 329, 380.

title: Document PatternKind vs is_negative field relationship
description: src/anti-patterns.ts:32-35 - DecompositionPatternSchema has both `kind: "anti_pattern"` and `is_negative: true` which seem redundant. Add JSDoc clarifying: "/** kind tracks pattern lifecycle (patternanti_pattern), is_negative is a derived boolean flag for quick filtering */"

title: Document EffortLevel time ranges in schema comment
description: src/schemas/task.ts:12-17 - Time ranges only in inline comments. Move to JSDoc for better IDE support: "/** Effort estimation: trivial (< 5 min), small (5-30 min), medium (30 min - 2 hours), large (2+ hours) */"

title: Clarify dependencies default value behavior
description: src/schemas/bead.ts:55 - `dependencies` uses `.optional().default([])` which is redundant - optional with default is always present. Change to just `.default([])` for clarity.

title: agent-mail.ts:122-131 - Non-atomic session state save
description: agent-mail.ts:122-131 - saveSessionState() writes directly to target file without atomic write-then-rename pattern. Could corrupt state if process crashes mid-write. Suggested fix: Write to temp file, then rename atomically.

title: learning.ts:197-234 - calculateCriterionWeight doesn't handle empty events
description: learning.ts:197-234 - calculateCriterionWeight accesses events[0]?.criterion when events array is empty, returning "unknown". Callers may not expect this. Suggested fix: Require non-empty events array or return error result.

title: swarm.ts:1710-1725 - Critical bug blocking silently continues on parse error
description: swarm.ts:1710-1725 - swarm_complete catches Zod parse errors on evaluation but doesn't block completion for critical issues beyond evaluation. If UBS returns parse errors, they're ignored. Suggested fix: Block completion on UBS parse errors too.

title: Document weight field decay semantics
description: src/schemas/evaluation.ts:34-35 - weight comment "lower = less reliable" could be more specific. Change to: "/** Current weight after 90-day half-life decay (0-1, 1=recent/validated, 0=old/unreliable) */"

title: Document SubtaskSpec estimated_complexity scale
description: src/schemas/bead.ts:106 - `estimated_complexity: z.number().int().min(1).max(5)` - scale meaning not documented. Add JSDoc: "/** Complexity estimate (1=trivial, 5=very complex) */"

title: Add JSDoc to plugin.ts exports
description: src/plugin.ts:1-12 - File has warning about exports but no JSDoc explaining why. Add: "/** CRITICAL: Only export the plugin function. OpenCode plugin loader calls all exports as functions, so exporting classes/constants will cause load failures. */"

title: Add constraint between status and blockers fields
description: src/schemas/task.ts:107-111 - AgentProgressSchema has `status: "blocked"` and `blockers` array but no validation linking them. Add `.refine()` to require blockers when status is blocked.

title: agent-mail.ts:1115-1120 - Unexpected response structure not validated
description: agent-mail.ts:1115-1120 - agentmail_reserve checks for null result but doesn't validate the shape of result.granted. If API changes and returns non-array, error message is generic. Suggested fix: Validate result shape with Zod or detailed error message.

title: learning.ts:423-437 - InMemoryFeedbackStorage has unbounded memory growth
description: learning.ts:423-437 - InMemoryFeedbackStorage stores all events in array with no cleanup or size limit. Long-running sessions could OOM. Suggested fix: Add max size with LRU eviction or periodic cleanup.

title: Simplify errorBullets initialization in StructuredValidationError
description: src/structured.ts:47 - `this.errorBullets = zodError ? formatZodErrors(zodError) : [message];` could use nullish coalescing for clarity: `this.errorBullets = zodError ? formatZodErrors(zodError) : [message];` (no change needed, but could assign in constructor params for cleaner code)

title: agent-mail.ts:380-398 - Missing cleanup after process spawn
description: agent-mail.ts:380-398 - restartServer() spawns processes but doesn't track them for cleanup. If kill commands fail or processes don't respond, orphaned processes accumulate. Suggested fix: Store PIDs and add cleanup handler.

title: Add client-side rate limiting to Agent Mail tools

title: Fix storage.ts critical issues: memory leak and unhandled promise rejection
Fix agent-mail.ts critical issues: state persistence and broken read_message
Fix beads.ts issues: epic rollback race condition and command injection risk
Fix schema validation: ISO-8601 timestamps and bead ID regex
Fix swarm.ts: dependency bounds validation and rate limiter race condition
learning.ts:254-259 - Potential division by zero in decay calculation
description: learning.ts:254-259 - scoreImplicitFeedback calls calculateDecayedValue but doesn't validate halfLifeDays isn't zero. If config is malformed, division by zero occurs. Suggested fix: Validate config or add bounds check.

title: Add safety check to findBalancedBraces depth
description: src/structured.ts:195-238 - findBalancedBraces has no max depth check. If depth goes negative or exceeds reasonable limit (e.g., 100), it could indicate malformed input. Add early return for depth < 0 or depth > 100.

title: Add JSDoc to DecomposedSubtask.risks field
description: src/schemas/task.ts:38 - `risks` field lacks description. Add JSDoc: "/** Potential risks or complications (e.g., 'tight coupling', 'data migration required') */"

title: Document warnMissingTool deduplication strategy
description: src/tool-availability.ts:301-310 - warnMissingTool uses Set for deduplication but comment doesn't explain why. Add JSDoc: "/** Logs warning once per tool per session. Uses Set to prevent spam when tool is checked repeatedly. */"

title: Swarm Plugin Intelligence Upgrade
description: Add learning and validation capabilities from cass-memory, ubs, and cass patterns: confidence decay, outcome scoring, anti-patterns, conflict detection, maturity tracking, UBS scanning, CASS history

title: Add confidence decay to evaluation criteria
Add outcome recording for implicit feedback
Add validation for SpawnedAgent.agent_name format
description: src/schemas/task.ts:81 - `agent_name` is plain string but Agent Mail uses specific format (e.g., "BlueLake"). Add regex validation or comment: "/** Agent Mail name (e.g., 'BlueLake', 'CrimsonRiver') */"

title: Review skill-builder PR branch
description: Analyze skill-builder PR branch for errors, omissions, improvements, oversights, gaps, and ideas. READ-ONLY code review - no modifications.

title: Review src/skills.ts core module
description: READ-ONLY review of src/skills.ts (1356 lines). Analyzing: security (path traversal, script execution), bugs (__dirname in ES modules, iteration errors), missing features, code quality. Found critical __dirname bug and TypeScript config issue.

title: Review TypeScript scripts
description: Analyzing init-skill.ts and validate-skill.ts for type safety, error handling, and code quality issues

title: Review swarm/beads integration
description: READ-ONLY review of swarm/beads integration for skills support. Analyzing: custom ID support (beads.ts +24 lines), skills integration (swarm.ts +286 lines), exports (index.ts +38 lines), schema changes (bead.ts). Found well-structured integration with one potential circular dependency concern in swarm_learn.
